definition: tick-bite sickness/informal term for 發熱伴血小板減少綜合徵|发热伴血小板减少综合征[fa1 re4 ban4 xue4 xiao3 ban3 jian3 shao3 zong1 he2 zheng1]

sentences.english: The concern has been raised recently over tick-borne infectious diseases in the field of infectious diseases in China.
sentences.chinese: 近來，蜱媒傳染病引起了國內傳染病界的重視。

sentences.english: Diazinon and chlorpyrifos, too, were eventually revealed to be hazardous.
sentences.chinese: 二嗪農和毒死蜱也逐漸顯露出危險性。

sentences.english: Conclusion Ixodes persulcatus was confirmed as Lyme disease vector.
sentences.chinese: 結論全溝硬蜱是吉林省萊姆病的主要媒介。

sentences.english: Objectives To reveal the methods of ticks control in hill areas.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲探索江蘇省丘陵山區蜱的有效防制方法。

sentences.english: Bovine theileriosis sergenti is one of hemozoon disease which is infected by tick.
sentences.chinese: 牛瑟氏泰勒蟲病是由蜱傳染的一種血液原蟲病。

sentences.english: Methods The specimens of ticks were collected with white cloth from grassland and picked from animals' body surface.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用布旗法和動物體表採集法採獲蜱類標本。

sentences.english: Note the site and date of the bite.
sentences.chinese: 記下蜱蟲咬你的地點與日期。

sentences.english: Sichuan Grain Storage Institute, Ministry of commerce The stored product mites is one of the three breaches in acarology.
sentences.chinese: 儲藏物蟎類是蜱蟎學三大分枝學科之一。

sentences.english: It is unclear just how effective this prevention measure is without the addition of a repellent.
sentences.chinese: 如果不噴灑蜱劑，該防護措施的實際效果，尚不明確。

sentences.english: The first continuous digestion was prolonged in diapausing females.
sentences.chinese: 滯育蜱第一連續消化階段延長。

sentences.english: The results showed that bifenthrin was more stable than chlorpyrifos.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，聯苯菊酯的持效性比毒死蜱的長。

sentences.english: There are 15 species of ticks and 46 species of medical mites in this area.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明河北省蜱類有15種，醫學蟎類有46種。

sentences.english: Possible culprits included ticks, roundworms and certain microbes.
sentences.chinese: 可能的病原包括蜱，蛔蟲和特定的微生物。

sentences.english: The mouthparts of larval and nymphal ticks will seldom be left in the skin.
sentences.chinese: 蜱蟲幼蟲與若蟲的口器很少會留在宿主皮膚裏。

sentences.english: Piroplasmosis is a kind of tick-borne protozosis world wide and is gaining increasing interest.
sentences.chinese: 梨形蟲病是一種越來越受關注的蜱播原蟲病。

sentences.english: Study on the monoclonal antibody to chlorpyrifos.
sentences.chinese: 抗毒死蜱單克隆抗體的研製。

definition: fire ant (Solenopsis invicta), an introduced species in China
